availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, gunsmith. Wednesbury, England native. Married to Mary Griffith.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 6, p. 62. “Death of Joseph Griffith,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), October 7, 1873 p. 4. Find A Grave, "Joseph Griffith, Sr. (1801-1873)," Memorial #94862064, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=94862064&ref=acom (accessed August, 9, 2017).
